thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 01 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Bankrupt Cenveo looks to give as good as it gets from irate fund

author: Jim Christie
title: Bankrupt Cenveo looks to give as good as it gets from irate fund
text:
Bankrupt printing company Cenveo Inc has taken the gloves off in its fight with noteholder Brigade Capital Management.
Cenveo accused Brigade in court papers on Tuesday of launching a smear campaign rooted in a bitter restructuring talks after the investment firm asked the U.S. Bankruptcy Court to order an independent examiner to probe the companyâ€™s affairs.
To read the full story on Westlaw Practitioner Insights, click here: bit.ly/2FhhRPA
